UnlockedDescription.default: You saved Johanka for the most grievous charge of heresy. Now she can live happily with Matthias.

UnlockedDescription.default: You committed every sin Johanka could come up with.

LockedDescription.it: Pentiti di qualsiasi peccato Johanka ti accusi.
LockedDescription.ru: Соверши все грехи, которые сможет придумать Йоханка.

UnlockedDescription.default: You've won 1,000 Groschen at dice.

UnlockedDescription.default: The Ring of Bacchus made its way back to Kuno.

LockedDescription.ru: Кольцо Бахуса вернулось к своему владельцу

UnlockedDescription.default: You came, you saw and you took Capon's necklace. Why make an unnecessary fuss?

UnlockedDescription.pl: Przybyłeś, zobaczyłeś i zgarnąłeś naszyjnik pana Ptaszka. No i o co ten cały krzyk?
UnlockedDescription.it: Hai recuperato la collana di Capon senza che nessuno si accorgesse della tua presenza.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Вы спасли Рыжего от разбойников.

LockedDescription.default: Get back Capon's necklace without permission from anyone.

LockedDescription.fr: Reprenez le collier de Capon sans demander la permission à quiconque.
LockedDescription.de: Beschaffe Herrn Hans’ Kette wieder, ohne irgendjemanden zu fragen.
LockedDescription.pl: Odzyskaj naszyjnik pana Ptaszka, nie pytając nikogo o zgodę.
LockedDescription.it: Recupera la collana di Capon senza chiederne il permesso.

UnlockedDescription.default: You saved Ginger from the bandits.

UnlockedDescription.default: You've saved 2,000 Groschen by haggling.

UnlockedDescription.default: You've finished the game in Hardcore Mode.

UnlockedDescription.default: You've bagged fifty animals.

UnlockedDisplayName.ru: Я могу бросить в любой момент

UnlockedDescription.default: You won the dice tournament in the robber baron's camp
UnlockedDescription.en: You won the dice tournament in the robber baron's camp
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Has ganado el torneo de dados del campamento del barón ladrón.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous avez remporté le tournoi de dés dans le camp du baron-bandit.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du hast das Würfelturnier im Lager des Räuberbarons gewonnen.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Wygrałeś turniej w kości w obozie rycerza-rozbójnika.
UnlockedDescription.it: Hai vinto il torneo di dadi nell’accampamento del nobile brigante.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Вы выиграли турнир по костям в лагере барона-разбойника.

LockedDisplayName.ru: Я могу бросить в любой момент

LockedDescription.default: Dice are most important, the rest will work itself out somehow.
LockedDescription.en: Dice are most important, the rest will work itself out somehow.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Los dedos son lo que más importa, el resto se arreglará solo de alguna manera.
LockedDescription.fr: Les dés sont votre vie, le reste peut attendre.
LockedDescription.de: Die Würfel sind das Wichtigste, der Rest ergibt sich irgendwie von selbst.
LockedDescription.pl: Najważniejsze są kości, reszta sama się jakoś ułoży.
LockedDescription.it: I dadi sono l’unica cosa importante, il resto si sistemerà.
LockedDescription.ru: Кости - самое важное. Остальное сработает как-нибудь само.

UnlockedDescription.default: You killed the murderer and threw his body down the same shaft he hid his victims in.
UnlockedDescription.en: You killed the murderer and threw his body down the same shaft he hid his victims in.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Has matado al asesino y arrojado su cuerpo al mismo pozo en el que había ocultado a sus víctimas.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous avez tué le meurtrier et jeté son corps au fond de la galerie où il cachait ses victimes.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du hast den Mörder getötet und in denselben Schacht geworfen, in den er seine Opfer warf.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Zabiłeś mordercę i wrzuciłeś jego ciało do tego samego szybu, w którym ukrywał swe ofiary.
UnlockedDescription.it: Hai ucciso l’assassino e lanciato il corpo nel medesimo tunnel che usava per le sue vittime.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Ты убил убийцу и сбросил его труп в ту же штольню, куда он сбрасывал своих жертв.

LockedDescription.default: The punishment fits the crime.
LockedDescription.en: The punishment fits the crime.
LockedDescription.es-ES: La pena es proporcional al castigo.
LockedDescription.fr: La punition est le reflet du crime.
LockedDescription.de: Führe den Mörder seiner gerechten Strafe zu.
LockedDescription.pl: Kto mieczem bojuje, od miecza ginie.
LockedDescription.it: Il castigo rifletta il crimine.

UnlockedDescription.default: You haven't slept for two days and nights.
UnlockedDescription.en: You haven't slept for two days and nights.

UnlockedDescription.de: Du hast seit zwei Tagen und Nächten nicht geschlafen.

UnlockedDescription.it: Hai rinunciato al sonno per due giorni e due notti.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Вы не спали два дня и две ночи.

LockedDescription.default: Don't sleep for two days and nights.
LockedDescription.en: Don't sleep for two days and nights.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Duerme poco durante 2 noches y 2 días.
LockedDescription.fr: Ne pas dormir pendant deux jours et nuits.
LockedDescription.de: Schlafe nicht für zwei Tage und zwei Nächte.
LockedDescription.pl: Nie śpij przez dwa dni i dwie noce.
LockedDescription.it: Rinuncia al sonno per due giorni e due notti.
LockedDescription.ru: Не спите два дня и две ночи.

UnlockedDescription.default: You've condemned your friends to death.
UnlockedDescription.en: You've condemned your friends to death.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Has condenado a tus amigos a morir.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous avez condamné vos amis à mort.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du hast deine Freunde zum Tode verdammt.
UnlockedDescription.it: Hai condannato a morte i tuoi amici.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Вы обрекли своих друзей на смерть.

LockedDescription.default: Betray your friends in the Gallows Brothers quest.
LockedDescription.en: Betray your friends in the Gallows Brothers quest.

LockedDescription.fr: Trahir vos amis lors de la quête Frères de potence.

LockedDescription.pl: Zdradź swych kumpli w zadaniu „Bracia na szubienicy”.
LockedDescription.it: Tradisci i tuoi amici nella missione Fratelli di forca.
LockedDescription.ru: Предайте своих друзей в задании "Братья по виселице".

UnlockedDescription.default: People love you everywhere you go.

UnlockedDescription.fr: Votre notoriété est à son maximum.
UnlockedDescription.de: Wohin auch immer du gehst, wirst du geschätzt.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Wszędzie, gdzie się pojawisz, ludzie cię kochają.
UnlockedDescription.it: Il popolo ti ama ovunque tu vada.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Где вы бы ни оказались, люди любят вас.

LockedDescription.default: Be popular in every town and village.
LockedDescription.en: Be popular in every town and village.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Hazte popular en todos los pueblos y aldeas.
LockedDescription.fr: Être bien reçu dans chaque ville et village.
LockedDescription.de: Werde in jeder Stadt und in jedem Dorf geschätzt.
LockedDescription.pl: Zdobądź popularność w każdym mieście i wiosce.
LockedDescription.it: Acquista fama in ogni città e villaggio.
LockedDescription.ru: Станьте популярным в каждом городке и в каждой деревне.

UnlockedDisplayName.es-ES: Su reino no ha venido a nosotros

UnlockedDescription.de: Dein Lebensweg hat im Hardcore-Modus ein jähes Ende genommen. Requiescat in pace.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Twoja przygoda z trybem Hardcore dobiegła końca. Spoczywaj w pokoju.
UnlockedDescription.it: Il tuo viaggio in modalità estrema si è concluso prima del tempo. Requiescat in pace.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Ваш путь в жестком режиме закончился безвременной кончиной. Покойтесь с миром.

LockedDisplayName.es-ES: Su reino no ha venido a nosotros

LockedDescription.default: Die for the first time in Hardcore Mode.

LockedDescription.de: Stirb erstmalig im Hardcore-Modus.

UnlockedDescription.it: Hai trionfato nella corsa di cavalli a Talmberg.

LockedDescription.it: Raggiungi il livello massimo.

UnlockedDescription.default: You recovered Pavel's treasure without being discovered by the Cumans.
UnlockedDescription.en: You recovered Pavel's treasure without being discovered by the Cumans.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Has recuperado el tesoro de Pavel sin que te descubrieran los cumanos.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du konntest Pavels Schatz bergen, ohne von den Kumanen entdeckt zu werden.
UnlockedDescription.pl: You recovered Pavel's treasure without being discovered by the Cumans.
UnlockedDescription.it: Hai recuperato il tesoro di Pavel senza essere scoperto dai cumani.

UnlockedDescription.default: You were robbed of the Ring of Bacchus. Tough luck!

UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Te han robado el anillo de Baco. ¡Qué mala suerte!
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous vous êtes fait voler l'anneau de Bacchus. Peste !
UnlockedDescription.de: Jemand hat dir den Ring des Bacchus gestohlen. Pech gehabt!
UnlockedDescription.it: Sei stato derubato dell’anello di Bacco. Dannata malasorte!
UnlockedDescription.ru: Ты лишился кольца Бахуса. Не повезло!

LockedDescription.default: You're not the only one playing the Ring of Bacchus game, so watch out for the others!

LockedDescription.es-ES: No solo tú juegas por el anillo de Baco, así que cuidado con los demás.

LockedDescription.de: Du bist nicht der Einzige, der das Spiel um den Ring des Bacchus spielt, also sei auf der Hut!
LockedDescription.pl: Nie jesteś jedyną osobą grającą w Pierścień Bachusa, więc uważaj na innych!
LockedDescription.it: Non sei l’unico a giocare con l’anello di Bacco, quindi guardati le spalle!
LockedDescription.ru: Ты не единственный игрок охотник за Кольцом Бахуса, так что остерегайся остальных!

UnlockedDescription.default: You've become the Talmberg Master Huntsman.

UnlockedDescription.it: Sei diventato il mastro cacciatore di Talmberg.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Вы стали ловчим Тальмберга.

LockedDescription.default: Become the Talmberg Huntsman.

UnlockedDescription.default: Everyone recognises you at first sight as the Rattay tourney champion.
UnlockedDescription.en: Everyone recognises you at first sight as the Rattay tourney champion.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Todo el mundo te reconoce a primera vista como campeón del torneo de Rataje.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Tout le monde reconnaît immédiatement en vous le champion du tournoi de Rattay.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du wirst von jedem sofort als Sieger des Rattayer Turniers wiedererkannt.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Wystarczy jeden rzut oka, aby zobaczyć, że jesteś mistrzem Ratajskiego Turnieju.
UnlockedDescription.it: Tutti ti riconoscono all’istante come il vincitore del torneo di Rattay.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Видя вас, все сразу понимают, что перед ними чемпион турнира Ратае.

LockedDescription.default: Get a complete set of armour from the Rattay tourney.
LockedDescription.en: Get a complete set of armour from the Rattay tourney.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Consigue un conjunto completo de armadura del torneo de Rataje.
LockedDescription.fr: Obtenez une panoplie d'armure complète du tournoi de Rattay.
LockedDescription.de: Erhalte beim Rattayer Turnier ein vollständiges Rüstungsset.
LockedDescription.pl: Zdobądź wszystkie elementy zbroi na Ratajskim Turnieju.
LockedDescription.it: Ottieni l’armatura completa del torneo di Rattay.
LockedDescription.ru: Получите полный набор доспехов после турнира в Ратае.

UnlockedDescription.default: You had a romantic affair with Theresa the millmaid.
UnlockedDescription.en: You had a romantic affair with Theresa the millmaid.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: You had a romantic affair with Theresa the millmaid.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous avez eu une liaison avec Thérèse, la jeune fille du moulin.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du hattest eine romantische Affäre mit dem Müllersmädchen Theresa.
UnlockedDescription.it: Hai vissuto una relazione romantica con Theresa, la ragazza del mulino.
UnlockedDescription.ru: У вас были романтические отношения с Терезой, девушкой с мельницы.

LockedDescription.default: Court Theresa.
LockedDescription.en: Court Theresa.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Corteja a Theresa.
LockedDescription.fr: Faire la cour à Thérèse.
LockedDescription.de: Umwerbe Theresa.
LockedDescription.it: Corteggia Theresa.

UnlockedDescription.default: Even men who fight for coin have their honour. You succeeded in reminding Kuno of his.
UnlockedDescription.en: Even men who fight for coin have their honour. You succeeded in reminding Kuno of his.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Incluso los hombres que luchan por dinero tienen honor. Has conseguido recordárselo a Kuno.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Même ceux qui se battent pour l’argent ne sont pas dépourvus d'honneur. Vous l'avez rappelé à Kuno.
UnlockedDescription.de: Auch Raubeine, die für Groschen kämpfen, haben Ehre, und du konntest Herrn Kuno daran erinnern.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Każdy, kto walczy za pieniądze, ma swój honor. Udało ci się przypomnieć o tym Kuno.
UnlockedDescription.it: Anche chi combatte per denaro ha un onore da difendere. Sei riuscito a ricordarlo anche a Kuno.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Даже у тех, кто сражается за гроши есть своя честь. Тебе удалось напомнить Куно об этом.

LockedDescription.default: Arouse the mercenary's sense of honour.
LockedDescription.en: Arouse the mercenary's sense of honour.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Invoca el sentido del honor del mercenario.
LockedDescription.fr: Réveiller le sens de l'honneur du mercenaire.
LockedDescription.de: Appelliere erfolgreich an Herrn Kunos Ehre.
LockedDescription.it: Ridesta il senso dell’onore del mercenario.

UnlockedDescription.default: You finished the game without killing anyone (except Runt, but he had it coming).
UnlockedDescription.en: You finished the game without killing anyone (except Runt, but he had it coming).
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Has finalizado el juego sin matar a nadie (excepto a Tapón, pero se lo merecía).
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous avez fini le jeu sans tuer quiconque (sauf le Haingre qui le méritait bien).
UnlockedDescription.de: Du hast in der Hauptgeschichte niemanden getötet (außer Wicht, aber der hat’s verdient).
UnlockedDescription.pl: Ukończyłeś grę, nie zabijając nikogo (oprócz Konusa, ale on był uprzedzony).
UnlockedDescription.it: Hai completato il gioco senza uccidere nessuno (tranne Runt, che tuttavia non meritava pietà).
UnlockedDescription.ru: Вы завершили игру, не убив никого (за исключением Коротышки, но он сам напросился).

LockedDescription.default: Don't kill anyone during main quest line (except Runt).
LockedDescription.en: Don't kill anyone during main quest line (except Runt).
LockedDescription.es-ES: No mates a nadie durante la línea de misión principal (excepto a Tapón).
LockedDescription.fr: Ne tuer personne pendant l'histoire principale (sauf le Haingre).
LockedDescription.de: Töte niemanden in der Hauptgeschichte (außer Wicht).
LockedDescription.pl: Nie zabijaj nikogo w trakcie głównej linii gry (oprócz Śmierdziela).
LockedDescription.it: Non uccidere nessuno nella storia principale (tranne Runt).
LockedDescription.ru: Не убивайте никого в заданиях основного сюжета (кроме Коротышки).

UnlockedDescription.default: You've become a monk.
UnlockedDescription.en: You've become a monk.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Te has hecho monje.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous vous êtes fait moine.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du bist Mönch geworden.
UnlockedDescription.it: Sei diventato un monaco.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Вы стали монахом.

LockedDescription.default: Become a monk.
LockedDescription.en: Become a monk.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Hazte monje.
LockedDescription.fr: Devenir moine.
LockedDescription.de: Werde Mönch.
LockedDescription.it: Diventa un monaco.

UnlockedDisplayName.it: Una sepoltura cristiana ma non troppo

UnlockedDescription.default: You've buried Lev next to his family.
UnlockedDescription.en: You've buried Lev next to his family.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Has enterrado a Lev junto a su familia.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous avez enterré Lev près de sa famille.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du hast Lev bei seiner Familie bestattet.
UnlockedDescription.it: Hai sepolto Lev accanto alla famiglia.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Вы похоронили Лева рядом с его семьей.

LockedDisplayName.it: Una sepoltura cristiana ma non troppo

LockedDescription.default: Grant peaceful rest to the soul of the wretched charcoal-burner, Lev.
LockedDescription.en: Grant peaceful rest to the soul of the wretched charcoal-burner, Lev.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Asegúrate de que el desgraciado carbonero, Lev, descansa en paz.
LockedDescription.fr: Accordez le repos à l'âme de Lev, le misérable charbonnier.
LockedDescription.de: Sorge dafür, dass die Seele des armseligen Köhlers Lev ihren Frieden findet.
LockedDescription.it: Assicurati che l’anima del povero carbonaio Lev riposi in pace.
LockedDescription.ru: Позаботьтесь об упокое души бедного углежога Лева.

UnlockedDisplayName.fr: Tu n'avais pas quelque chose à faire ?

UnlockedDescription.default: You were supposed to play dice, not hang around the outhouse!
UnlockedDescription.en: You were supposed to play dice, not hang around the outhouse!
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: ¡Se suponía que tenías que jugar a los dados, no andar por las letrinas!
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous étiez censé jouer aux dés, pas passer votre temps aux latrines !
UnlockedDescription.de: Du hättest würfeln und nicht bis zum Exzess saufen sollen!
UnlockedDescription.pl: Miałeś zagrać w kości, a nie kręcić się koło wychodka!
UnlockedDescription.it: Dovevi giocare ai dadi, non stramazzare nella latrina!
UnlockedDescription.ru: Предполагалось, что ты будешь играть в кости, а не таскаться возле хлева!

LockedDisplayName.fr: Tu n'avais pas quelque chose à faire ?

LockedDescription.default: Drink yourself into oblivion with Ambrose!
LockedDescription.en: Drink yourself into oblivion with Ambrose!
LockedDescription.es-ES: ¡Bebe hasta la inconsciencia con Ambrose!
LockedDescription.fr: Vous étiez censé jouer aux dés, pas passer votre temps aux latrines !
LockedDescription.de: Betrinke dich mit Ambros bis zur Besinnungslosigkeit.
LockedDescription.pl: Upij się do nieprzytomności z Ambrożym!
LockedDescription.it: Bevi fino allo sfinimento con Ambrose!

UnlockedDescription.default: You've made Pribyslavitz the richest village in the province.
UnlockedDescription.en: You've made Pribyslavitz the richest village in the province.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Has convertido Přibyslavice en la aldea más rica de la provincia.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous avez fait de Pribyslavice le village le plus riche de la province.
UnlockedDescription.de: Dank dir ist Pribyslawitz das reichste Dorf in der Provinz.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Sprawiłeś, że Przybysławice są najbogatszą wsią w okolicy.
UnlockedDescription.it: Hai reso Pribyslavitz il villaggio più ricco della provincia.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Вы сделали Прибыславицу богатейшей деревней в крае.

LockedDescription.default: Make 2,000 Groschen a day from Pribyslavitz.
LockedDescription.en: Make 2,000 Groschen a day from Pribyslavitz.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Gana 2000 groschen al día en Přibyslavice.
LockedDescription.fr: Avoir un revenu de 2 000 groschen par jour en provenance de Pribyslavice.
LockedDescription.de: Nimm in Pribyslawitz 2.000 Groschen pro Tag ein.
LockedDescription.pl: Wypracuj dochód 2000 groszy na dzień w Przybysławicach.
LockedDescription.it: Make 2,000 Groschen a day from Pribyslavitz.
LockedDescription.ru: Заставьте Прибыславицу зарабатывать 2 000 грошей в день.Make 2,000 Groschen a day from Pribyslavitz.

UnlockedDescription.default: You've found all wayside shrines and conciliatory crosses.
UnlockedDescription.en: You've found all wayside shrines and conciliatory crosses.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Has encontrado todos los santuarios del camino y cruces de redención.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous avez trouvé l'ensemble des sanctuaires et croix mémoriales.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du hast alle Bildstöcke und Sühnekreuze gefunden.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Znalazłeś wszystkie boże męki i krzyże pokutne.
UnlockedDescription.it: Hai trovato tutti i sacrari votivi e le croci espiatorie.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Вы нашли все часовни и примирительные кресты.

LockedDescription.default: Find all wayside shrines and conciliatory crosses.
LockedDescription.en: Find all wayside shrines and conciliatory crosses.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Encuentra todos los santuarios en el camino y cruces de redención.
LockedDescription.fr: Trouver tous les sanctuaires et croix mémoriales.
LockedDescription.de: Finde alle Bildstöcke und Sühnekreuze.
LockedDescription.pl: Znajdź wszystkie boże męki i krzyże pokutne.
LockedDescription.it: Trova tutti i sacrari votivi e le croci espiatorie.
LockedDescription.ru: Найдите все часовни и примирительные кресты.

UnlockedDisplayName.fr: Croix de bois croix de fer

UnlockedDescription.default: You promised Jakey you'd let him go, and you kept your word.
UnlockedDescription.en: You promised Jakey you'd let him go, and you kept your word.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Has prometido a Jakey que lo liberarías y has cumplido tu palabra.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous avez promis à Jakey de le laisser partir et vous avez tenu parole.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du hast Jackel versprochen, ihn laufen zu lassen, und Wort gehalten.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Obiecałeś Jackowi, że go wypuścisz. Dotrzymałeś słowa.
UnlockedDescription.it: Hai promesso a Jakey di lasciarlo andare e hai mantenuto la parola.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Ты обещал Приблуде отпустить его и сдержал свое слово.

LockedDisplayName.fr: Croix de bois croix de fer

LockedDescription.default: Keep your word at any cost.
LockedDescription.en: Keep your word at any cost.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Cumplir tu palabra a toda costa.
LockedDescription.fr: Tenir parole à tout prix.
LockedDescription.de: Halte dein Versprechen um jeden Preis.
LockedDescription.it: Mantieni la tua parola a ogni costo.

UnlockedDescription.default: You healed all the sick in Merhojed.

UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Has curado a todos los enfermos de Mrchojedy.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous avez soigné tous les malades de Merhojed.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du hast alle Kranken in Merhojed geheilt.
UnlockedDescription.it: Hai curato tutti i malati a Merhojed.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Вы исцелили всех заболевших в Мрхоедах.

LockedDescription.default: Heal all the sick in Merhojed.

LockedDescription.it: Cura tutti i malati a Merhojed.

UnlockedDescription.default: You've walked more than 50 Km.

UnlockedDescription.de: Du bist mehr als 50 km gegangen.
UnlockedDescription.it: Hai percorso a piedi più di 50 chilometri.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Вы прошли больше 50 км.

LockedDescription.it: Percorri a piedi più di 50 chilometri.

UnlockedDescription.default: You've taken your revenant duties very seriously in your haunting of Ledetchko.
UnlockedDescription.en: You've taken your revenant duties very seriously in your haunting of Ledetchko.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Te has tomado muy en serio las andanzas del resucitado en tu misión de atemorizar Ledečko.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous avez hanté Ledetchko avec une conscience professionnelle incomparable.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du hast deine Pflichten hinsichtlich des Wiedergängers in Ledetschko ernst genommen.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Bardzo poważnie potraktowałeś obowiązki upiora, kiedy straszyłeś mieszkańców Ledeczka.
UnlockedDescription.it: Hai svolto con impegno il compito di terrorizzare Ledetchko nel ruolo del redivivo.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Запугивая Ледечко под личиной неупокоенного, вы перегнули палку.

LockedDescription.default: Think up even more ways to haunt the Ledetchko villagers than the charlatan told you.
LockedDescription.en: Think up even more ways to haunt the Ledetchko villagers than the charlatan told you.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Piensa más formas de atemorizar a los lugareños de Ledečko de las que te contó el charlatán.
LockedDescription.fr: Hantez les villageois de Ledetchko par d'autres moyens que ceux du charlatan.
LockedDescription.de: Lass dir selbst etwas einfallen, um den Dörflern in Ledetschko noch mehr Angst einzujagen.
LockedDescription.pl: Wymyśl inne sposoby straszenia ludzi w Ledeczku niż te, podane przez szarlatana.
LockedDescription.it: Inventa nuovi modi per terrorizzare Ledetchko, oltre quelli suggeriti dal ciarlatano.
LockedDescription.ru: Придумайте больше способов запугать жителей Ледечко, чем поведал вам шарлатан.

UnlockedDescription.default: You drove Wolflin out of the province.
UnlockedDescription.en: You drove Wolflin out of the province.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Has expulsado a Wolflin de la provincia.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous avez chassé Wolflin de la province.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du hast Wolflin aus der Gegend vertrieben.
UnlockedDescription.it: Hai cacciato Wolflin dai territori della provincia.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Вы изгнали Вольфлина из провинции.

LockedDescription.default: Complete the Robber Baron quest.

LockedDescription.it: Completa la missione Un nobile brigante.

LockedDescription.de: Stiehl Dinge im Gesamtwert von 30.000 Groschen.
LockedDescription.pl: Ukradnij rzeczy o wspólnej wartości 30,000 groszy.
LockedDescription.it: Ruba oggetti per un valore totale di 30.000 groschen.
LockedDescription.ru: Украдите вещи общей стоимостью в 30 000 грошей.

UnlockedDescription.default: You've finished the game in Hardcore Mode with all negative perks.
UnlockedDescription.en: You've finished the game in Hardcore Mode with all negative perks.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Has acabado el juego en modo Extremo con todas las ventajas negativas.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous avez terminé le jeu en mode Hardcore avec tous les atouts négatifs.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du hast das Spiel im Hardcore-Modus mit allen negativen Spezialisierungen abgeschlossen.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Ukończyłeś grę w trybie Hardcore ze wszystkimi negatywnymi Dodatkami.
UnlockedDescription.it: Hai completato il gioco in modalità estrema con tutti i talenti negativi.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Вы прошли игру в жестком режиме, получив все отрицательные умения.

LockedDescription.default: Finish the game in Hardcore Mode with all negative perks.
LockedDescription.en: Finish the game in Hardcore Mode with all negative perks.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Acaba el juego en modo Extremo con todas las ventajas negativas.
LockedDescription.fr: Terminer le jeu en mode Hardcore avec tous les atouts négatifs.
LockedDescription.de: Schließe das Spiel im Hardcore-Modus mit allen negativen Spezialisierungen ab.
LockedDescription.it: Completa il gioco in modalità estrema con tutti i talenti negativi.
LockedDescription.ru: Пройдите игру в жестком режиме, получив все отрицательные умения.

UnlockedDescription.default: You left Jakey tied to the tree to consider the error of his ways.
UnlockedDescription.en: You left Jakey tied to the tree to consider the error of his ways.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Has dejado a Jakey atado al árbol para que medite lo erróneo de su comportamiento.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous avez laissé Jakey ligoté à l'arbre pour méditer sur ses erreurs.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du hast Jackel nicht befreit, wodurch er Zeit gehabt hat, über seine Missetat nachzudenken.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Pozostawiłeś Jacka przywiązanego do drzewa, żeby zastanowił się nad popełnionymi błędami.
UnlockedDescription.it: Hai abbandonato Jakey legato a un albero, perché riflettesse sui suoi errori.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Ты оставил Приблуду, привязанным к дереву. Пусть поразмышляет о своих грехах.

LockedDescription.default: Leave Jakey to consider the error of his ways.
LockedDescription.en: Leave Jakey to consider the error of his ways.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Dejar que Jakey medite lo erróneo de su comportamiento.
LockedDescription.fr: Laisser Jakey méditer sur ses erreurs.
LockedDescription.de: Befreie Jackel nicht, damit er über seine Missetat nachdenken kann.
LockedDescription.pl: Nie uwalniaj Jacka, niech się zastanowi nad popełnionymi błędami.
LockedDescription.it: Abbandona Jakey a riflettere sui suoi errori.
LockedDescription.ru: Оставь Приблуду размышлять об ошибках прошлого.

UnlockedDescription.default: You tracked down the raiders who attacked the farm.
UnlockedDescription.en: You tracked down the raiders who attacked the farm.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Has seguido el rastro de los asaltantes que atacaronla granja.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous avez retrouvé les incendiaires qui ont attaqué la ferme.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du hast die Halunken aufgespürt, die den Bauernhof angegriffen haben.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Udało ci się odszukać najeźdźców, którzy zaatakowali gospodarstwo.
UnlockedDescription.it: Hai rintracciato i furfanti che hanno attaccato la fattoria.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Ты выследил налетчиков, напавших на хозяйство.

LockedDescription.default: Track down the raiders who attacked the farm.
LockedDescription.en: Track down the raiders who attacked the farm.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Seguir el rastro de los asaltantes que atacaron la granja.
LockedDescription.fr: Remonter la piste des incendiaires qui ont attaqué la ferme.
LockedDescription.de: Spüre die Halunken auf, die den Bauernhof angegriffen haben.
LockedDescription.it: Rintraccia i furfanti che hanno attaccato la fattoria.

UnlockedDescription.default: You've discovered all the locations on the map.
UnlockedDescription.en: You've discovered all the locations on the map.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Has descubierto todos los lugares del mapa.
UnlockedDescription.fr: La carte du jeu n'a plus de secret pour vous.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du hast alle Orte auf der Karte entdeckt.
UnlockedDescription.it: Hai scoperto tutti i luoghi sulla mappa.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Вы обнаружили все места на карте.

LockedDescription.default: Discover all locations on the map.
LockedDescription.en: Discover all locations on the map.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Descubre todos los lugares del mapa.
LockedDescription.fr: Découvrir tous les emplacements de la carte.
LockedDescription.de: Entdecke alle Orte auf der Karte.
LockedDescription.it: Scopri tutti i luoghi sulla mappa.

UnlockedDescription.default: You've renewed the whole of Pribyslavitz without being able to read.
UnlockedDescription.en: You've renewed the whole of Pribyslavitz without being able to read.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Has reconstruido Přibyslavice sin saber leer.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous avez réhabilité entièrement Pribyslavice sans savoir lire.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du hast ganz Pribyslawitz erneuert, ohne des Lesens kundig zu sein.
UnlockedDescription.it: You've renewed the whole of Pribyslavitz without being able to read.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Вы восстановили всю Прибыславицу, не умея при этом читать.

LockedDescription.default: Renew the whole of Pribyslavitz without being able to read.
LockedDescription.en: Renew the whole of Pribyslavitz without being able to read.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Reconstruye Přibyslavice sin saber leer.
LockedDescription.fr: Réhabiliter entièrement Pribyslavice sans savoir lire.
LockedDescription.de: Erneuere ganz Pribyslawitz, ohne des Lesens kundig zu sein.
LockedDescription.it: Ricostruisci completamente Pribyslavitz senza saper leggere.
LockedDescription.ru: Восстановите всю Прибыславицу, не умея при этом читать.

UnlockedDescription.default: Your trust in Lord Capon is indisputable. Or you're an idiot.
UnlockedDescription.en: Your trust in Lord Capon is indisputable. Or you're an idiot.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Tu confianza en lord Capon es indiscutible. O quizá seas un idiota.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Votre confiance envers le seigneur Capon est sans faille. Ou bien vous êtes un peu idiot.
UnlockedDescription.de: Ohne Zweifel setzt du großes Vertrauen in Herrn Hans – oder bist einfach ein Narr.
UnlockedDescription.pl: W pełni ufasz panu Ptaszkowi. Lub jesteś idiotą.
UnlockedDescription.it: La tua fiducia in ser Capon è incrollabile. Oppure sei un idiota.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Ваша вера в пана Птачека неоспорима. Или вы идиот.

LockedDescription.default: Capon will succeed, even though you sent him off with a nasty rash.
LockedDescription.en: Capon will succeed, even though you sent him off with a nasty rash.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Capon tendrá éxito, aunque lo has despachado con un repugnante sarpullido.
LockedDescription.fr: Capon parviendra à ses fins, même s'il est rentré chez lui avec de terribles rougeurs.
LockedDescription.de: Capon will succeed, even though you sent him off with a nasty rash.
LockedDescription.pl: Ptaszek odniesie sukces, chociaż wysłałeś go z okropną wysypką.
LockedDescription.it: Capon ce la farà, nonostante il brutto sfogo cutaneo.
LockedDescription.ru: Птачек преуспеет даже несмотря на то, что вы отказали ему с отвратительной поспешностью.

UnlockedDescription.default: You finished the game as a virgin.
UnlockedDescription.en: You finished the game as a virgin.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Has completado el juego con tu virginidad intacta.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous avez fini le jeu en restant vierge.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du hast das Spiel als Jungfrau abgeschlossen.
UnlockedDescription.it: Sei rimasto vergine fino al termine del gioco.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Вы завершили игру, оставшись девственником.

LockedDescription.default: Stay celibate and complete the entire game as a virgin.
LockedDescription.en: Stay celibate and complete the entire game as a virgin.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Mantente célibe y completa el juego con tu virginidad intacta.
LockedDescription.fr: Rester célibataire et terminer le jeu vierge.
LockedDescription.de: Bleibe keusch und schließ das ganze Spiel als Jungfrau ab.
LockedDescription.pl: Pozostań w celibacie do końca gry i zakończ ją jako prawiczek.
LockedDescription.it: Votati alla castità e resta vergine fino al termine del gioco.
LockedDescription.ru: Соблюдайте целибат и завершите всю игру, оставшись девственником.

UnlockedDescription.default: You decided to see what Henslin had in his braies without being observed.
UnlockedDescription.en: You decided to see what Henslin had in his braies without being observed.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Has decidido averiguar lo que tiene Henslin en los calzones sin que te observen.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous avez décidé de voir ce que Henslin a dans les braies sans être repéré.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du hast unbemerkt nachgesehen, was Henslin in seiner Bruoch hat.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Zdecydowałeś się po kryjomu rzucić okiem, co Henslin ma w swych portkach.
UnlockedDescription.it: Hai deciso di guardare nelle brache di Henslin senza essere visto.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Ты решил посмотреть, что у Хенслина на животе, не будучи замеченным.

LockedDescription.default: See what Henslin has in his braies without being observed.
LockedDescription.en: See what Henslin has in his braies without being observed.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Averigua lo que tiene Henslin en los calzones sin que te observen.
LockedDescription.fr: Voir ce qu'Henslin a dans les braies, sans être repéré.
LockedDescription.de: Sieh unbemerkt nach, was Henslin in seiner Bruoch hat.
LockedDescription.pl: Po kryjomu rzuć okiem, co Henslin ma w swych portkach.
LockedDescription.it: Guarda nelle brache di Henslin senza essere visto.
LockedDescription.ru: Посмотри, что у Хенслина на животе, не будучи замеченным.

UnlockedDescription.default: You've been of invaluable assistance to the great lover, Sir Hans Capon.
UnlockedDescription.en: You've been of invaluable assistance to the great lover, Sir Hans Capon.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: You've been of invaluable assistance to the great lover, Sir Hans Capon.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vous avez été d'une aide inestimable au roi des séducteurs, le seigneur Hans Capon.
UnlockedDescription.de: Du warst Herrn Hans, dem blaublütigen Weiberheld, eine unverzichtbare Hilfe.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Oddałeś nieocenioną przysługę wielkiemu amantowi, panu Janowi Ptaszkowi.
UnlockedDescription.it: You've been of invaluable assistance to the great lover, Sir Hans Capon.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Вы были бесценным помощником великого любовника пана Яна Птачека.

LockedDescription.default: Everything has to go according to Sir Hans' plan.
LockedDescription.en: Everything has to go according to Sir Hans' plan.
LockedDescription.es-ES: Todo va de acuerdo con el plan de sir Hans.
LockedDescription.fr: Tout doit se passer conformément au plan du seigneur Hans.
LockedDescription.de: Alles muss ganz nach Herrn Hans’ Plan verlaufen.
LockedDescription.pl: Wszystko przebiegło zgodnie z planem pana Jana.
LockedDescription.it: Tutto deve procedere secondo il piano di ser Hans.
LockedDescription.ru: Все должно происходить по плану пана Яна.
